name: Tigers of the Pacific 3 Ace
description:
Take to the skies on a death-defying journey across the Pacific War of World War II with the Tigers of the Pacific 3! Join the dogfight against fleets of ruthless fighter pilots, ground, and sea targets like battleships and destroyers in the China and Pacific theaters. Secure Allied victory over both land and sea. Achieve aerial supremacy in the decisive battles of WWII to prove yourself as a true Ace Pilot. Tigers of the Pacific 3 features fast-paced, aerial arcade gameplay within a realistic 3D environment. The call to arms has been sounded! The Tigers are mobilizing. Will YOU join the fight? Enter the fray and earn your place as a TIGER OF THE PACIFIC!

Ace Features:
No Banner Ads
No Compulsory Full-screen Ads
Exclusive In-Game Decal
150 Starting Gems
5 Random Cards

Features:
Experience the fast-paced aerial combat of WWII like never before, right in the palm of your hands.
WWII themed planes, environment and enemy classes.
Non-stop addictive, arcade action in 10 China and the Pacific campaign missions, plus a bonus bombing mission.
Pilot Career Mode with multiple difficulties that will push the limits of even the most skilled pilot.
6 playable planes with unique base stats and special abilities!
Customization system brings RPG-style gear which you can mix and match to fit any situation or play style.
Check your six! Recruit up to four different wing-men to cover you in tough battles.
Airplane customization to fit your personal style.
Never lose progress with the automatic save feature.
Sign into your profile and access your hangar, planes and cards from any iOS device.
Over 40 challenging achievements to earn. Are you good enough to earn them?
Global leaderboards to challenge players around the world.
Easy to play, hard to master.
Feature updates constantly to improve your game experience.
More missions, planes, and collectibles will be coming soon!
